title: Diary Of A Broken Doll 2: A Tale of Drugs, Lust, and Betrayal
description: Diary Of A Broken Doll 3 now available! Flyy Girl meets the Coldest Winter Ever with a modern dramatic twist. The sequel to the page turning Diary of A Broken Doll novel. Consumed by life’s struggles, Courtney is in the fight of her life; literally. Surrounded by drugs and money Courtney takes on an alternate persona and uses what she has to get what she wants. For Courtney business was good. It would seem as if that would be all that mattered. The fact that she hadn’t run into her mother in over a year was eating her alive. For all she knew, her mother could’ve been dead. Tina would be lucky if she were dead.In the pit of her stomach though, Courtney hoped that her mother wasn't dead. She wanted answers. Answers seemed to make everything line up in perfect light. While trying to build her own empire to free herself from a perpetual dependence on the men in her life, Courtney must come to terms with her past to allow herself to one day find a love of her own.
author: Tatum James
